sentence: What grades have I gotten in courses taught by Prof. DeOrio ?
sql: SELECT INSTRUCTORalias0.NAME , STUDENT_RECORDalias0.GRADE FROM STUDENT_RECORD AS STUDENT_RECORDalias0 INNER JOIN OFFERING_INSTRUCTOR AS OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0 ON STUDENT_RECORDalias0.OFFERING_ID = OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.OFFERING_ID INNER JOIN INSTRUCTOR AS INSTRUCTORalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID = INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID WHERE LOWER( INSTRUCTORalias0.NAME ) LIKE "%deorio%" AND STUDENT_RECORDalias0.STUDENT_ID = 1 ;
